text: allāhana kaigaḷu kaṭṭive endu yahūdigaḷu hēḷuttāre. Kaṭṭalpaḍali avara kaigaḷu. Avara hēḷikeya kāraṇa avaru śapitarādaru. Nijavāgi allāhana kaigaḷu dhārāḷa viśālavāgive. Avanu tānicchisidante kharcu māḍuttāne. Nim'ma oḍeyanu nimagēnannu iḷisi koṭṭiruvanō adarindāgi avaralli heccinavara vidrōha mattu dhikkāravu mattaṣṭu heccalide. Nāvu punarut'thāna dinadavaregū avara naḍuve vaira mattu vaiṣamyavannu bittiruvevu. Avaru yud'dhada beṅkiyannu bhugilebbisidāga allāhanu adannu taṇisi biḍuttāne. Ādare avaru bhūmiyalli aśānti habbalu śramisuttalē iruttāre. Allāhanantu, aśānti habbuvavarannu khaṇḍita meccuvudilla
